text: The location was great the views at the restaurant were amazing. They need more vegetarian options for breakfast i e vegetarian sausages etc
Room was clean Complimentary drinks was a good treat each day. Breakfast could have more vegetarian options Also restaurant menu could have more children s options and vegetarian choices
The location is the best in Central Vienna. Catering for Vegetarian
Breakfast. No clock in swimming pool area No vegetarian sausage for breakfast
Tasty vegetarian breakfast cozy lobby. The bed wasn t comfortable at all
The staff were friendly. The choice of hot vegetarian items in the breakfast
Location. Breakfast could have much more vegetables for vegetarian or vegan people Thanks
lovely helpful staff close to most tourist attractions. lack of vegetarian cooked breakfast
Excellent executive lounge idea friendly staff. Not enough hot vegetarian food for breakfast
Premium rooms were nice and large. Breakfast should have had more vegetarian options
It would be great if the had Gluten Free options and vegetarian sausages
Excellent property. No choice for a vegetarian meal for dinner at the restaurant
Awesome location and hospitality. Few more vegetarian options could have been provided in breakfast
Good location for our purposes and a good variety of vegetarian dishes for breakfast .
Very nice perfect location with a little fridge and its own gourmet vegetarian restaurant
Location. Some noise guests at night No vegetarian sausages even thigh requested on booking form
Very comfortable hotel Staff was very friendly. Breakfast was average Little or no vegetarian choise
Breakfast was good Staff are very friendly Location is fantastic. Not many vegetarian options for food
Convenient location Besides the metro station U Bhan Krieau. Costly breakfast perticularly if you are vegetarian
Great staff who tried to resolve any concerns. Non functioning room fridge limited vegetarian menu options
